thread.title: ThrottleNet Named Best In Value for 2015 by Small Business Monthly
thread.title_full: ThrottleNet Named Best In Value for 2015 by Small Business Monthly

title: ThrottleNet Named Best In Value for 2015 by Small Business Monthly
text: ThrottleNet Named Best In Value for 2015 by Small Business Monthly ThrottleNet receives special recognition for third year in a row for providing outstanding value to customers. ST. LOUIS, MO, September 26,   ThrottleNet, an IT firm based in St. Louis, MO has once again been named a "Best In Value" company by St. Louis Small Business Monthly, a magazine providing business ideas, strategies and insights for CEOs, CFOs, presidents, owners and other top executives to help them grow their companies. Best In Value recognizes a select group of St. Louis area firms who provide outstanding value to their customers. The winning companies are selected from nominations and comments from clients. This is the third consecutive year ThrottleNet has received this recognition. The full list of businesses receiving this acknowledgement will appear in the publication's October, 2015 edition. "ThrottleNet strives to provide great value to our customers and   once again been recognized for this effort by Small Business Monthly," said George Rosenthal, President. "Receiving this recognition for three years in a row is no small feat. It demonstrates the commitment of our entire team to not only meet but exceed our clients' expectations as their IT partner, day after day, month after month, and year after year." ThrottleNet specializes in outsourced IT through Managed Network Services (MNS). The firm specializes in these services as well as other aspects of MNS including Virtual CIO, Managed Back-up, Cloud Computing, Mobile Apps, hardware and more. Rosenthal said the firm will strive to continue to provide its outstanding customer valued services whether it be with their Help Desk or insights on technology trends through its live program "TN Tech Talk" aired weekly on Periscope and available at the ThrottleNet website http://www.ThrottleNet.tv. About ThrottleNet Inc ThrottleNet, Inc. was founded in 1999. ThrottleNet has won multiple awards, received recognition as a Top 20 IT Firm by Small Business Monthly, and named one of the Largest Information Technology Consulting Firms by the St. Louis Business Journal, among other accolades. ThrottleNet Inc. offers an array of technology services and products to help business owners achieve their corporate goals and accelerate business growth. These include cloud computing, custom software and mobile application development, and outsourced Managed Network Services which helps companies improve their technology uptime and IT capabilities while, at the same time, reduces costs. To learn how to accelerate your IT visit ThrottleNet online at http://www.throttlenet.com. # # #
